name: The guy who lost his arms (2014)
name_original: The guy who lost his arms (2014)
description:
The Guy Who Lost His Arms is my first participation to the Ludum Dare contest. It was a compo entry (48h, alone). The theme of this edition was "Connected World".

The game is a simple platformer where you have to frequently switch between two parallel worlds in order to progress.

Results (among 1493 participants) :

#238 Humor 2.91
#642 Mood 2.88
#669 Theme 3.11
#689 Fun 2.89
#706 Audio 2.41
#751 Overall 3.00
#766 Graphics 2.78
#926 Innovation 2.64

Link to the game on the LD website

---

The Guy Who Lost His Arms est ma première participation à la Ludum Dare, dans la catégorie compo (48h, seul). Le thème de cette édition était "Connected World".

Le jeu est un simple jeu de plateforme dans lequel il faut régulièrement alterner entre deux mondes parallèles pour avancer.

Page du jeu sur le site de la Ludum Dare
